ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: author_
ivardefs.desc: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

ivardefs.name: certainty_
ivardefs.desc: A description of the certainty of the risk estimate.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the risk evidence synthesis and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the risk evidence synthesis.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the risk evidence synthesis was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the risk ev

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the risk evidence synthesis from a consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: editor_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the risk evidence synthesis content was or is planned to be in active use.

ivardefs.name: endorser_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

ivardefs.name: exposure
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resource that defines the exposure for the research.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this risk evidence synthesis when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the risk evidence synthesis is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the risk evidence synthesis. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: A human-readable string to clarify or explain concepts about the resource.

ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resomece that defines the outcome for the research.

ivardefs.name: population
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resource that defines the population for the research.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the risk evidence synthesis.

ivardefs.name: relatedArtifact_
ivardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

ivardefs.name: reviewer_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

ivardefs.name: riskEstimate
ivardefs.desc: The estimated risk of the outcome.

ivardefs.name: sampleSize
ivardefs.desc: A description of the size of the sample involved in the synthesis.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of this risk evidence synthesis. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

ivardefs.name: studyType
ivardefs.desc: Type of study eg randomized trial.

ivardefs.name: synthesisType
ivardefs.desc: Type of synthesis eg meta-analysis.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the risk evidence synthesis.

ivardefs.name: topic_
ivardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the RiskEvidenceSynthesis. Topics provide a high-level categorization grouping types of EffectEvidenceSynthesiss that can be useful for filtering and searching.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this risk evidence synthesis when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the risk evidence synthesis when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the risk evidence synthesis author and is not expected to be glo

properties.desc: The RiskEvidenceSynthesis resource describes the likelihood of an outcome in a population plus exposure state where the risk estimate is derived from a combination of research studies.
